visa_info: Exchange students must apply to New Zealand Immigration for a student visa. It is NOT possible for exchange students to travel to New Zealand on a visitor's visa and apply for a student permit upon arrival in New Zealand. Students are advised to apply for the necessary visa immediately after they receive the official offer letter/email from their host university. Exchange students are required to purchase a compulsory medical and travel insurance when studying in New Zealand.

cost_of_living.comprehensive_travel_insurance: Recommended for the full duration of your stay abroad, including personal travel within/outside Australia
